task_description:
These are some low code improvements, impliment aall of them

1. Keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Enter) - 5-10 lines
2. Auto-focus search input - 5 lines
3. Clear search button - 10 lines
4. Remember time range - 8 lines
5. Query history dropdown - 30 lines
6. Relative time tooltips - 5 lines
7. Better empty state - 15 lines
8. Copy as JSON - 10 lines
9. Export to CSV - 25 lines
10. Show execution time - 10 lines
